preface.title: Installation Overview
preface.para: Before beginning your installation, you should prepare thoroughly. Several resources are available to assist you.

listitem.para: Work through the information in the . &soclcmplan; covers prerequisites, considerations, and choices that are necessary to install your cloud successfully.
Study the example configurations in the table below offered by &kw-hos-phrase;. These example configurations are a key aspect of installing &productname; with the least amount of time and effort.

Familiarize yourself with Git. Git is a version control system for tracking and managing changes to your cloud configuration, even with installation methods (such as the &install_ui;) that do not require direct interaction with version control. For more information about Git, see .
